physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient had multiple osteochondromas detected by radiographs, including a tibiofibular osteochondroma next to the knee, a large chondrosarcoma in the left iliopubic bone, left and right humeral osteochondromas, Madelung deformities in both radii, and multiple tiny phalangeal osteochondromas. MRI showed an iliac mass with heterogeneous signal in the left iliopubic bone with limb and pelvic compromise.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The lesion behaved as a chondrosarcoma and had recurred after three resections, indicating progression of the disease. Histological findings showed low-grade neoplasia (grade-I chondrosarcoma).
